table.Common Medical Event: If you visit a health care provider’s office or clinic
table.Services You May Need: Primary care visit to treat an injury or illness

table.Common Medical Event: If you visit a health care provider’s office or clinic
table.Limitations, Exceptions, & Other Importa: You may have to pay for services that aren’t preventive. Ask your provider if the services needed are preventive. Then check what your plan will pay for.

table.Common Medical Event: If you visit a health care provider’s office or clinic
If you need drugs to treat your illness or condition
table.Non-Network Provider (You will pay the m: 30% coinsurance up to $250/prescription (retail) and Not covered (home delivery)
table.Limitations, Exceptions, & Other Importa: Most home delivery is 90-day supply. For more information, refer to “National Drug List” at http://www.anthem.com/pharmacyinformation/

table.Common Medical Event: If you need drugs to treat your illness or condition
table.Services You May Need: Tier 2 - Typically Preferred Brand & Non-Preferred Generic Drugs
table.Non-Network Provider (You will pay the m: 30% coinsurance up to $250/prescription (retail) and Not covered (home delivery)
table.Limitations, Exceptions, & Other Importa: *See Prescription Drug section of the plan or policy document (e.g. evidence of coverage or certificate).

table.Common Medical Event: If you need drugs to treat your illness or condition
